actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Act of June 30, 1954, as amended, providing for the continuance of civil government for the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $86,625,000 for the civil government for the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, of which $13,515,000 shall be appropriated for the Government of the Northern Mariana Islands until that Government becomes a commonwealth.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Act of June 30, 1954, as amended, providing for the continuance of civil government for the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
